name: tm43
effect: Teaches Secret Power to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flame Charge to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Secret Power Gen II: Detect Gen I: Sky Attack)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Adds an effect to
attack depending
on the location.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Adds an effect to
attack depending
on the location.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that may
have an additional
effect that varies
with the terrain.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An attack move with effects that
vary depending on the user’s
environment.

An attack move with effects that

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user cloaks itself with flame and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user’s Speed stat.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user cloaks itself with flame and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user’s Speed stat.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks.
Then, building up more power,
the user raises its Speed stat.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,
building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,
building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break
barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.
